txt.en: The corpses of the Rohirrim are being defiled by the Enemy
While searching for survivors in Thornhope, you have found many dead Rohirrim.
While searching for survivors in Thornhope, you have found many dead Rohirrim.\n\nUnable to bury the bodies, you should burn them.
There are dead Rohirrim throughout Thornhope.\n\nUnable to bury the dead Rohirrim, due to the presence of the Orcs, you should burn the corpses to prevent their further defilement.
'You what? I suppose there was nothing more you could do under the circumstances, but burning is not the way of my people!\n\n'Curse the Orcs, curse them to death and destruction!'
There are dead Rohirrim throughout Thornhope.\n\nUnable to bury the dead Rohirrim, due to the presence of the Orcs, you should burn the corpses to prevent their further defilement.
Thane Béortnoth is encamped beyond the walls of Thornhope.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Béortnoth and let him know what you have done.
